item.title: Using Linux a VM as a network router in Hyper-V
item.author: philip.fourie@gmail.com (Philip Fourie)
item.description: Occasionally, I need to spin up a few local virtual machines on my Windows 10 laptop to test a networking concept. Building a practical multi-machine configuration can be challenging. For me, this typically means: The VM host can connect to the guest VMs. The guest VMs can connect to the host. The guest VMs can connect to each other.
